short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find out if your favorite YouTube creators are live on Twitch!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a button to YouTube that tells you if the creator you're watching is live on Twitch!
Click the button to go to their stream!

Learn more at https://www.getlivelink.com/
